edition: Hymni Homerici, creator; Hesiod, creator; Homer, creator; Evelyn-White, Hugh G. (Hugh Gerard), d. 1924, translator

text.0:
I begin to sing of Asclepius, son of Apollo and healer of sicknesses. In the Dotian
 plain fair Coronis, daughter of King Phlegyas, bare him, a great joy to men, a soother of
 cruel pangs.
text.1: And so hail to you, lord: in my song I make my prayer to thee!

author: homeric hymns
